channel.title: Help Me1
channel.description:
I have port fowarded my server. I go to add it on server status checker and I get this error...
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'nuggetscape.no-ip.org' OR `ipfield` = '124.187.55.52'' at line 1
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Help Me1
item.dc:creator: @Im_A_Nugget Im A Nugget
item.description:
@Im_A_Nugget wrote:

I have port fowarded my server. I go to add it on server status checker and I get this error…

You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ’ IP= 'nuggetscape.no-ip.org' ORipfield` = ‘124.187.55.52’’ at line 1

What am I doing wrong?
